name: Aunt Rocky's Magic Dough (Gluten-Free, Grain-Free)
author: Auntrocky
summary: The 'magic' of this recipe is a truly fluffy bread-like dough that works great for buns and dinner rolls. Gluten-free, nut-free, low carb, Atkins®, keto, and diabetic-friendly. This dough is amazing! It's light, fluffy, moist, and tastes very close to traditional bread. The mix makes 6 burger, sandwich, or hot dog buns, or 12 dinner rolls.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package cream cheese, softened (such as Organic Valley®)
2 tablespoons oat fiber (such as LifeSource Foods®)
1 tablespoon golden flaxseed meal (such as Bob's Red Mill®)
1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese powder (such as Kraft® 100% Grated Parmesan Cheese)
1 ½ teaspoons baking powder (such as Rumford®)
½ teaspoon low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Whisk cream cheese and eggs together in a bowl until creamy
Add oat fiber, yeast, flaxseed meal, psyllium husk powder, Parmesan cheese, baking powder, and sweetener
Let dough rest until thickened, about 10 minutes
Divide dough into 6 portions; scoop onto the baking sheet
Form into your desired shape using wet fingers; smooth over the tops
Bake in the preheated oven until springy to the touch and tops are lightly browned, about 30 minutes
